examples.korean: I’m taking a few clothes and some books, not much else. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 옷 몇 가지 하고 책을 좀 가져갈 거지만 그 외 다른 건 별로 많지 않아. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’m taking a few clothes and some books, not much else. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Ugh I need a nap. But whenever I nap at the library, I don’t feel refreshed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 으~ 낮잠이 필요해. 하지만 도서관에서 낮잠 잘 때마다 느끼는 거지만 개운하지가 않아. DARAKWON
examples.english: Ugh I need a nap. But whenever I nap at the library, I don’t feel refreshed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: At first, there will be noobyism, but soon you will be accustomed to the game. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 처음에는 숙련되지 않은 상태가 있을 거지만 곧 그 게임에 적응할 거야. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: At first, there will be noobyism, but soon you will be accustomed to the game. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Steven Gerrard will not return from injury on Saturday, but could be fit to play against Fulham next weekend. 듣기 Add to Wordbook Steven Gerrard가 토요일에 부상에서 복귀하지는 않을 거지만, 다음 주말 Fullham과의 경기에는 플레이할 정도로 회복될 수 있을 거야. DARAKWON
examples.english: Steven Gerrard will not return from injury on Saturday, but could be fit to play against Fulham next weekend. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I will get married, but I won't have a baby. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저는 결혼할 거지만 아기를 갖지 않을 거에요. Neungyule
examples.english: I will get married, but I won't have a baby. Add to Wordbook
